            "custom_endpoint": null

        "relations": []

}

item.name: 0102 - Update OpenId Provider Configuration with invalid information

exec: pm.test("The OpenId Provider informations have not been updated because there's missing properties.", function () {

pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.be.eql("[is_active] The property is_active is required
[is_forced] The property is_forced is required
[base_url] The property base_url is required
[authorization_endpoint] The property authorization_endpoint is required
[token_endpoint] The property token_endpoint is required
[introspection_token_endpoint] The property introspection_token_endpoint is required
[userinfo_endpoint] The property userinfo_endpoint is required
[endsession_endpoint] The property endsession_endpoint is required
[connection_scopes] The property connection_scopes is required
[login_claim] The property login_claim is required
[client_id] The property client_id is required
[client_secret] The property client_secret is required
[authentication_type] The property authentication_type is required
[verify_peer] The property verify_peer is required
[auto_import] The property auto_import is required
[contact_template] The property contact_template is required
[email_bind_attribute] The property email_bind_attribute is required
[fullname_bind_attribute] The property fullname_bind_attribute is required
[authentication_conditions] The property authentication_conditions is required
[groups_mapping] The property groups_mapping is required
[roles_mapping] The property roles_mapping is required
[redirect_url] The property redirect_url is required
")

item.name: PUT invalid value type passed to a property (error)

exec: pm.test("The OpenId Provider informations have not been updated because there's values of the wrong type.", function () {

pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.be.eql("[is_active] Integer value found, but a boolean is required
[is_forced] String value found, but a boolean is required
[base_url] Boolean value found, but a string or a null is required
[authorization_endpoint] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[token_endpoint] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[introspection_token_endpoint] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[userinfo_endpoint] Boolean value found, but a string or a null is required
[endsession_endpoint] Boolean value found, but a string or a null is required
[connection_scopes[0]] Boolean value found, but a string is required
[connection_scopes[1]] Integer value found, but a string is required
[login_claim] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[client_id] Boolean value found, but a string or a null is required
[client_secret] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[authentication_type] Does not have a value in the enumeration ["client_secret_post","client_secret_basic"]
[verify_peer] String value found, but a boolean is required
[auto_import] String value found, but a boolean is required
[contact_template.id] String value found, but a number is required
[contact_template.name] Integer value found, but a string is required
[email_bind_attribute] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[fullname_bind_attribute] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[authentication_conditions.is_enabled] String value found, but a boolean is required
[authentication_conditions.attribute_path] Boolean value found, but a string is required
[authentication_conditions.endpoint.type] Does not have a value in the enumeration ["introspection_endpoint","user_information_endpoint","custom_endpoint"]
[authentication_conditions.endpoint.custom_endpoint] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[authentication_conditions.authorized_values[0]] Boolean value found, but a string is required
[authentication_conditions.trusted_client_addresses[0]] Integer value found, but a string is required
[authentication_conditions.blacklist_client_addresses[0]] Integer value found, but a string is required
[groups_mapping.is_enabled] String value found, but a boolean is required
[groups_mapping.attribute_path] Integer value found, but a string is required
[groups_mapping.endpoint.type] Does not have a value in the enumeration ["introspection_endpoint","user_information_endpoint","custom_endpoint"]
[groups_mapping.endpoint.custom_endpoint] Boolean value found, but a string or a null is required
[groups_mapping.relations[0]] String value found, but an object is required
[roles_mapping.is_enabled] Integer value found, but a boolean is required
[roles_mapping.apply_only_first_role] String value found, but a boolean is required
[roles_mapping.attribute_path] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[roles_mapping.endpoint.type] Integer value found, but a string is required
[roles_mapping.endpoint.type] Does not have a value in the enumeration ["introspection_endpoint","user_information_endpoint","custom_endpoint"]
[roles_mapping.endpoint.custom_endpoint] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
[roles_mapping.relations[0].claim_value] Integer value found, but a string is required
[roles_mapping.relations[0].access_group_id] String value found, but an integer is required
[roles_mapping.relations[0].priority] String value found, but an integer is required
[redirect_url] Integer value found, but a string or a null is required
")
pm.test("The OpenId Provider informations have not been updated because there's values of the wrong type.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.be.eql("[AuthenticationConditions::trustedClientAddresses] The value \".@\" was expected to be a valid ip address or domain name")
pm.test("The OpenId Provider informations have not been updated because there's values of the wrong type.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.be.eql("[AuthenticationConditions::blacklistClientAddresses] The value \".@\" was expected to be a valid ip address or domain name")
